featured.text: The increasing population in Saudi Arabia has resulted in shortages of fresh water.
As the world population continues to grow, shortages of fresh water will occur more often and the need for additional water supplies will become critical.

definition.zh_def: 短缺，指某種物資或資源不足的情況。
definition.en_def: A situation in which there is not enough of something that is needed.
definition.example: There is a shortage of water in the region due to the ongoing drought.
